channel.title: CVE Feed for Booking Ultra Pro -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Booking Ultra Pro -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36855|2024-09-17T00:26:27.648Z -- booking%20ultra%20pro -- booking%20ultra%20pro%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Booking Ultra Pro plugin <= 1.1.4 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-36854|2024-09-17T03:18:10.398Z -- booking%20ultra%20pro -- booking%20ultra%20pro%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Booking Ultra Pro plugin <= 1.1.4 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-32960|2024-08-02T02:27:52.396Z -- booking%20ultra%20pro -- booking%20ultra%20pro
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Booking Ultra Pro allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Booking Ultra Pro: from n/a through 1.1.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-38676|2024-07-24T13:47:31.353Z -- booking%20ultra%20pro -- booking%20ultra%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Booking Ultra Pro allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Booking Ultra Pro: from n/a through 1.1.13.

item.title: CVE-2024-38717|2024-07-18T15:19:15.337Z -- booking%20ultra%20pro -- booking%20ultra%20pro
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Booking Ultra Pro allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Booking Ultra Pro: from n/a through 1.1.13.
